summary: This position is located in the Fire Department section of the Facilities Management Service. The purpose of the position is to provide twenty-four (24) hour fire suppression, protection and fire inspector services to the VA Black Hills Health Care System (BHHCS) comprised of main campuses at Hot Springs and Fort Meade, South Dakota.
duties: Participates in all aspects of structural and wild land firefighting operations and rescue.
Performs the duties of a fire inspector by participating in fire inspection, fire alarm maintenance and prevention programs.
Serves as a driver of a Wild Land unit, as assigned for training or in the absence of the driver/operator.
Serves as driver/operator of the structural firefighting apparatus including the primary or reserve engine.
The Firefighter participates in Confined Space Rescue and is a Hazardous Materials First Responder.
Provides fire protection at the hospital engaged in using various types of gases, oxygen, nitrogen, gasoline, diesel fuel and natural gas.

Performs fire/rescue and firefighting duties at large hospital complex/ campus consisting of fuel tank farms with 30k gallon tanks, multi-story buildings housing non-ambulatory, nursing home and mental health patients.

Assists the Shift Captain in Fire Department training, fire prevention programs, fire prevention educational services, and maintenance programs, and assists and participates in the Fire Department physical fitness programs.

Participates in all Fire Department training, Medical Center fire drills, and building inspections assigned to the Fire Department and completes all forms and paperwork for documentation, as assigned.

Assists the sick or injured if available, by performing the Heimlich maneuver on choking victims; managing respiratory and cardiac emergencies to include performing cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), bag-valve-mask resuscitation, or automatic external defibrillation (AED) anywhere on Campus grounds, in the Domiciliary or out buildings not associated with the Hospital, until a higher level of medical care is available; transport patients; summons the ambulance.
requirements: You must be a U.S. Citizen to apply for this job
Designated and/or random drug testing may be required
Selective Service Registration is required for males born after 12/31/1959
May be required to serve a probationary period
Selected applicants will be required to complete an online onboarding process
